Html:
Hi together,
i have two regions, one, the MainRegion holds my view's.
When i add a view(usercontrol) Prism add them as a TabPage, pretty cool but with blank(empty) TabPageHeader.

Now i'm looking for a way to give the TabPages a name, i can see this in StockTraderRI but can't get them to work.
Any help????
thanks
Peter

Hi Peter, I've just written a post about how to do this.

  • Prism How-To: Provide metadata to a view that was placed into a region
Please let me know if this helps you,

Ezequiel Jadib
http://staff.southworks.net/blogs/ejadib

Hi,
sounds very interesting but the link does not work
thanks
Peter

Hi,
your link is working and this is what i'm looking for. But, you are binding to DataContext, i, and i think many others as well have a different problem.....
I would like to show selection list's in any of the TapPages.
So, the user selects Customers in an menu so i have to show a listview to select customers. While binding the header to DataContext give some problems. Did you have an generic way to bind the HeaderInfo and a list????

thanks
Peter
